title: haNNu bandide janaru
sahitya:
haNNu bandide janaru haNNu koLLiro


anupallavi

  haNNu embo harinAma embo shrutiya nimbeya


caraNam 1    manada bhUmiyali puTTi matigaLinda ballavisi tamage tamage tiLida hottu bhakutiyindali 
olidu gonjalAda haNNu jnAnavembo panjarada tiLidu nAlikeye mEle bandu kuLita bALeya
    caraNam 2    ondu varuSa ondu balavu bitti banda rAma candranembo kalpavrkSa kadaLi santati 
kundadihudu sakala balava alli gone gUDi gOvinda rAma vAsudEvanembo halasina
    caraNam 3    hariya nAmavannu nitya smarisa balla vipraige suraru munigaLella bAguvarellayya 
giriya mElippa alamElumanga arasanAda purandara viTTalanembo jambunEraLe
